title: Mackerel and orange salad
ingredients: ['2 smoked mackerel fillets, about 175g (6oz) in total, skinned and broken into large chunks', '1 large orange', '1 small red onion, finely sliced', '20g (¾ oz) parsley sprigs, tough stalks removed', 'Juice of ½ lemon', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Black pepper']
